attributes.action: play "Things Can Only Get Better" through the loudspeakers of the new CCTV cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want "Things Can Only Get Better" played via the new CCTV loudspeaker system every day at 09:00 hrs. We believe it will help improve the morale of the nation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
